sponsor.partnerMessage: Beth Bowen Dental Studio is a dental office unlike anything you've experienced. Their patients receive personalized, compassionate care from one of the most highly-skilled dentists in the area. They prioritize listening to and caring for their patients. Learn more here.

posts.title: Dance Studio In Rogers Announces Grand Opening
posts.topic: Sponsored by Arthur Murray Dance Studio
posts.content:
There’s a new dance studio in Rogers, and the owners invite you to the grand opening celebration! 

  • Dance party: Arthur Murray Dance Studio is designed to resemble a 1920s ballroom lounge and is complete with a baby grand piano. The celebration on June 11 will have food, good music, and promises lots of fun on the dance floor — even if you have two left feet and no rhythm. 
  • Learn to dance: If you sign up for the Grand Opening Special before June 11, you will receive one free Personal Dance Lesson; no dance partner or experience is required. Start your dance journey connected and join the DanceNWA Facebook Group too! 

Click HERE to learn more about the grand opening.

posts.title: Weekend Roundup
posts.content:
Hooray for the weekend! Here are some happenings we think you’ll enjoy: 

  • Pew pew: It’s Star Wars Night and firework night at Arvest Ballpark tonight! 
  • Summer readers: The FPL is hosting a summer reading kickoff event including games, food, performances and more Saturday
  • Celebrate: Grab your lawn chairs for another Forest Concert Series at Crystal Bridges this weekend. 
  • History buff: Grab your family and head over to the Rogers Historical Museum for Family Day on Saturday. 
  • Glow: Participate or watch the Glow Run at Memorial Park in Bentonville today!
  • Dog fun: Bring your furry friends to Woof & Wander in Rogers to celebrate its 5th friendiversary party on Sunday! 
  • Singin’ outside: Get in on all this live summer music in NWA. 
  • Turntables: A celebration of some talented female DJs is returning to Prairie Street Live this Saturday. Don’t miss it!
  • Market: A Spring Market is going on at the Benton County Fairgrounds today and tomorrow!

Whatever you do, have fun and be safe out there! See you Monday.

posts.title: First Friday: Bike Fest Today In Bentonville
posts.content:
Bentonville's June First Friday is today, and it's all things cycling this month! The theme: Bike Fest. 

  • Bike tricks: The world's most celebrated trials rider and multiple UCI Trialbike world champion will be performing on the main stage on the square throughout the evening, giving all who attend a taste of what to expect during the Bentonville Bike Fest later this month. 
  • On the square: All your favorite cycling vendors will be present during today's First Friday event, along with the usual favorite food trucks, live music, and family-friendly activities. 

Learn more HERE.

posts.title: OTB Calling Models For Runway Show
posts.content:
If you’re curious about getting started in the acting and modeling world, there is an opportunity for you this weekend in Rogers. 

  • Seminar: On Saturday at 1p, the Ozark Talent Bank (OTB) is hosting a free seminar for setting up realistic goals for getting started in the industry. A professional talent agent will answer any questions you might have. RSVP via the OTB Facebook Page or Instagram.
  • Auditions: Then, at 3p, the OTB Runway Show auditions will return! The auditions are for a show on June 18 with the theme: Blacklight Runway. OTB is seeking models and aspiring models of all ages, shapes, and sizes, and no runway experience is needed.

For more information, click HERE.

pick.title: NWA Daily Picks
pick.content:
• Top tier: Accelerate your career with the Walton MBA program, ranked #11 best return on investment out of 600 MBA programs.*
  • Making moves: Check out the folks in the NWA startup ecosystem that are making things happen in the region.
  • More parties: Fossil Cove Brewing Co. is throwing its 10-year anniversary party tomorrow with free hotdogs and brats while they last! 
  • Multimedia: Art Ventures has paired paintings with a play at TheatreSquared that will run through July 11. 
  • Walking with dogs: The Best Friends Animal Society is hosting a group hike with furry friends at Osage Park tomorrow. 
  • Tell it: Have a story? We have room in the newsletter for you! Check out our deals HERE.

*Content is sponsored
